post:
# ZipVPS Virtual Private Server Offers

## Information
- All VPS are located in Buffalo, NY
- 100% satisfaction guranteed - No Questions Asked 3 day refund policy.
- Payment methods accepted are PayPal, Credit Cards and Bitcoins.
- All orders processed within 1 to 6 hours.
- We are here to help you where we can even though the service is unmanaged.
- Anything else you wonder about, just ask!
- [Our policies - TOS/Privacy Policy/AUP](http://www.holoshed.com/policies.html)

# Deals 


**ZipVPS Gig 1024MB** `$7.00 Monthly with coupon code QV1A2H0KI0`

- 1024M Guaranteed RAM
- 50GB Storage on a Flashcache SSD Cached RAID10/BBU Disk Array
- 1000GB Transfer on a Gigabit Port
- 4 Fair Use CPU Cores
- 1 Included IPv4 IP Address
- [Click here to Order](https://cs.holoshed.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=3&promocode=QV1A2H0KI0)

**ZipVPS Meg 512MB** `$5.00 Monthly with coupon code WRNU5QY2IZ`

- 512M Guaranteed RAM
- 25GB Storage on a Flashcache SSD Cached RAID10/BBU Disk Array
- 500GB Transfer on a Gigabit Port
- 2 Fair Use CPU Cores
- 1 Included IPv4 IP Address
- [Click here to Order](https://cs.holoshed.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2&promocode=WRNU5QY2IZ)

**ZipVPS Byte 256MB** `$3.00 Monthly with coupon code J36PUS8M1X`

- 256M Guaranteed RAM
- 10GB Storage on a Flashcache SSD Cached RAID10/BBU Disk Array
- 250GB Transfer on a Gigabit Port
- 1 Fair Use CPU Cores
- 1 Included IPv4 IP Address
- [Click here to Order](https://cs.holoshed.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=4&promocode=J36PUS8M1X)

**Addons**

- Extra IP: $1.00 each per month, max 5.
- Windows Server Add On: $5.00 per month (Choice of 2008 R2 or 2012.)
- cPanel License: $13.00 per month (Will install for free upon request.)

## Custom Plans/Custom OS/ISO/Templates
- Want to double up on resources (such as make the 1024MB plan a 2048MB plan)? Just do a ticket and we can set something up for you at double the quoted price. (Such as $7.00 x 2 = $14.00)
- If you want a custom template or ISO added, submit a ticket and let us know!


## Network Tests: [Ping/Traceroute/Speed](http://ny-test.holoshed.com/)


### Coupon codes apply for the life of the VPS.
